note.p: The term chanzhuzao only occurs in Yingzao fashi (juan 4 and 17). Literally meaning “to wrap or coil around,” chan describes how the ludou 櫨斗 of the pingzuo 平坐 tightly encircles the upper pillar at the corners. The term zao refers to a standardized construction.

Scholars unanimously agree that chanzhuzao is a structural form joining the bases of the upper story pillars with pingzuo. However, no existing wooden structures perfectly match the chanzhuzao as described in Yingzao fashi. Contemporary scholars have debated the description of the chanzhuzao in Yingzao fashi, as well as its origins, development, and structural functions, with no consensus reached. (Chen 2012; Zhang 2015; Yu 2021; Chen 1981, 141; Ma 2005)

The reconstructions of chanzhuzao are particularly significant. To date, there are five typical reconstruction proposals, each with their own merits and drawbacks (see drawings). (Liang 2013, 479; Chen 1981, 141; Zhang 2015; Ma 2005; Chen 2012)

In contemporary scholarship, the term chanzhuzao is also used to describe the method of reducing the dimensions between the upper and lower stories of multi-story buildings, in which the upper pillars and pingzuo follow the method of chanzhuzao as specified in Yingzao fashi, while the pingzuo columns are set back relative to the lower columns. The term has even been broadened to refer to any method in which upper columns are set back relative to lower columns, regardless of their relationship to the pingzuo. (Chen 1981, 141)

纏柱造僅見于宋《營造法式》（卷4，卷17）。從字義看，“纏”意為纏繞，形容平坐鋪作櫨斗在轉角處緊密環繞上層柱的形態。“造”指定型化的構造做法。學者一致同意纏柱造是用於多層建築的，一種上層柱與平坐結合的 構造形式，且沒有完全符合營造法式記載的纏柱造的木構實例。但對營造法式記載的纏柱造的復原、纏柱造的起源、發展、結構作用等問題都有許多爭論（陈 2012；张 2015；喻 2021；陈 1981,141；马 2005），沒有一致意見。

纏柱造復原尤為重要。学者一致认定的缠柱造形态特点有：平坐铺作转角处三枚栌斗紧密环绕上层柱，上层柱立于柱脚方上，平坐铺作里跳穿串上层柱身。但对柱脚方的位置、形态，以及上层柱与平坐之间的结构关系的理解差异， 产生了不同的缠柱造复原。迄今有五種典型設想（梁 2013,479；陈 1981,141；张 2015；马 2005；陈 2012），各有合理與不合理之處，不同觀點間又有联系以及发展的关系。此外，纏柱造在當代研究中亦被認為是一種樓閣上下層收分方式， 即上層柱與平坐呈營造法式規定的纏柱造關係，平坐柱相對下層柱退入；甚至泛指上層柱相對下層柱內收的做法，可以不與平坐關聯。（陈 1981,141）
